snippet: Performance spaces around Washington are the sites of a weeklong music festival celebrating the works and 75th birthday of the composer Louis Andriessen.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews opening night performances of works composed by Louis Andriessen at National Gallery of Art as part of Andriessen 75, weeklong festival celebrating his career and 75th birthday.
lead_paragraph: Performance spaces around Washington are the sites of a weeklong music festival celebrating the works and 75th birthday of the composer Louis Andriessen.

headline.seo: A Loud, Movable Birthday Festival for Louis Andriessen
headline.main: The Road to Hell and Back Is Paved With Surprises
headline.print_headline: The Road to Hell and Back Is Paved With Surprises
